titleStmt.title: The welspoken nobody God that is all good and almyghtye ...
Niemants hais ich, was jeder man tut, das zücht man mich. English
titleStmt.author: Schan, Jörg.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Schan, Jörg. Niemants hais ich, was jeder man tut, das zücht man mich.
Verse - "Many speke of Roben hoode that neuer shott in his bowe".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
